column4: I got a problem. I installed ubuntu 6.10(edgy) on my desktop and there is no orange when loading http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y28/kylewitt/NoOrange.png
When its loading, it shows a grey color and I can't read the words its loading
Does anyone know how to fix this problem:http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y28/kylewitt/NoOrange.png -- It does not show the orange when loading
Can someone please help me?
Can someone please help me with a problem that I am having
does it still load things even though the color doesn't show up?
Yeah it does
but it looks weird and funky and I'm not liking it
Anyway to fix that problem?
maybe changing the theme could help.
Well it did not do this when I installed it on my laptop
I'll give that a try
Alright changing the theme fixed the problem
Thank you for your help  :)
I'm guessing it's some kind of minor bug
Yeah maybe, i'm installing the 915resolution thing to make my resolution 1280x800
that means you have a new kernel installed.
on linux, you have the option to use older kernels in case the newest kernel has problems.
but I've never had any problems with the updated kernels on ubuntu so I just pick the option on top in grub.
Oh that explains it
Thanks, your quite the helper today :) along with everyone else of course
you can remove those older kernels from grup by adding # before those lines in grub.conf
I think I will do that
you can do anything on linux that you can on windows except games, although I have gotten some games to work using cedega.
